description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4zaU3GlTGMNqLFS8]{Familiar Master Dedication}, able to cast spells

Requirements You have line of effect to your familiar.

Under your tutelage, your familiar has grown attuned to the hidden currents of the world and can serve as a conduit for your magic. If the next action you use is to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} that has a range, the spell uses the familiar as its origin point.

prerequisites.value: Familiar Master Dedication, able to cast spells
